home.metaTitle: LLEDO Industries | Precision Machining & Industrial Maintenance for Aerospace
home.metaDescription: French industrial group specializing in precision machining, sheet metal work, and GSE equipment for aerospace and defense. ISO 9001 & EN 9100 certified. 36 years of expertise.
